applogic

Class Mapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • applogic.Mapper

  • public class Mapper
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that maps the whereabouts of the Tetrimino piece in playing field.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Mapper(PlayingField playingField)
      Constructor that uses the current playing field as a playingField.

    • Method Detail

      • setNewTetrimino

        public void setNewTetrimino(Tetrimino tetrimino)
        Method that sets a new Tetrimino piece in the container to a playingField.
        Parameters:
        tetrimino - that is about to be placed in a conttainer and set to a playingField.

      • containerForNewTetrimino

        public Cell[][] containerForNewTetrimino(int startRow,
                                         int startColumn)
        Method that makes a new container for a new Tetrimino piece.
        Parameters:
        startRow - place in rows where the container is placed.
        startColumn - place in columns where the container is placed.
        Returns:
        Tetrimino container that has a Tetrmino inside.

        Returns:

      • moveTetriminoContainer

        public void moveTetriminoContainer(Direction direction)
        Moves the Tetrimino container to a direction specified by the parameter.
        Parameters:
        direction - specifies the direction where the Tetrimino piece is to be moved.

      • movementToDirectionIsValid

        public boolean movementToDirectionIsValid(Direction direction)
        Method that checks that the movement of the Tetrimino piece is valid.
        Parameters:
        direction - direction where the Tetrimino piece is moving.
        Returns:
        boolean value for the validity of the movement. True if valid. False if not.

      • cellInNewPosition

        public Cell cellInNewPosition(Direction direction,
                              Cell cell)
        Gets the cell at a new position if the cell is not null.
        Parameters:
        direction - direction where the new cell is at.
        cell - that is moving at the playing field.
        Returns:
        the moving Cell object.

      • setAllCells

        public void setAllCells(Cell[][] cells,
                        boolean occupied)
        Sets the boolean value for all cells in a two dimensional Cell object tableux.
        Parameters:
        cells - two dimensional tableaux consisting Cell objects.
        occupied - boolean value which the cells in the tableaux are to be set.

      • getTotalMapRows

        public int getTotalMapRows()
        Gets to total number of of rows in playingField.

      • rotateTetriminoContainer

        public void rotateTetriminoContainer(Rotation rotation)
        Method that initializes rotation of the Tetrimino container. First it check if the rotation is valid and then is sets up a new layout for the rotated Tetrimino as it rotates the piece at the same time and lastly it sets up a container for it.
        Parameters:
        rotation - Direction of the rotation (either clockwise or counterclockwise).
